led to formal debate or that has stirred up controversy; disputed; controversial.
an instance of a sound being produced.
the act or an instance of playing a musical insttument.
a large group of musicians playing various musical instruments together; an orchestra.
a slender stick strung along its length with horsehairs, drawn across the strings of a violin, cello, etc. to play it; a bow.
a curved stick to play some percussion instruments, by beating or rubbing on.
(pl.) argument and counter argument.
